name: student-info-monorepo

scripts.start: bun run start:backend & bun run start:frontend & wait
scripts.dev: bun run dev:backend & bun run dev:frontend & wait
scripts.build: bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd backend && bun install && cd ../frontend && bun install

description: Student Info Management System - Monorepo with Frontend and Backend
